ModMetaData.name: Villages:Homes
ModMetaData.author: Pizzacat OttersHoldHands iforgotmysocks AobaKuma,Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description: Build your own villages. Three Sizes of homes to keep your pawns warm,comfy and dry. Special Thanks to Zaljerem for porting over the code from the Tent mod for 1.5 rw!!
